description: Non material amendment to planning permission PP/24/00733 (Variation of Condition 2 (Compliance with approved drawings) and Condition 36 (Noise from building services plant and vents) of planning permission PP/16/04793 (Variation of condition 2 (Compliance with approved drawings) of planning permission 15/04338 to include new plans reflecting proposed changes including the demolition and rebuild of Friese Green House, alterations to the King's Road elevation, additional basement excavation and provision of additional photovoltaic panels) to allow for external alterations to provide comfort cooling to the residential units on the site and to reflect the submitted noise survey in relation to building services plant and energy strategy. (MAJOR APPLICATION)(CONSERVATION AREA)(SETTING OF LISTED BUILDING)) for reconfigurations and subdivision of Retail Unit 1 to create Unit 1A and 1B and external alterations to three shop windows on the Kings Road facade.
